name: Tanologist Extra Dark Self Tan Mousse, Clear Self-Tanning Mousse, Streak-Free, Natural Glow, No Fake Tan Smell Or Orange Tone, Long Lasting, Clean Ingredients, 6.76 fl. oz/200 ml Bottle
short_description: Tanologist Self-Tan Mousse is a clear self-tanner that transforms from water to a lightweight tanning foam so there’s no streaks, no transfer and no stains
Self-tanning mousse develops in 1-3 hours and dries quickly without an orange tone. Apply with a tanning mitt and leave on longer for a deeper, customizable bronzy glow
Self-tanning foam is infused with skincare ingredients like pink grapefruit, goji berry and juniper to help hydrate and even skin tone- for softer, healthier skin
Long-lasting self-tanner is available in 3 shades: Light, Medium, Dark and Extra Dark. This natural-looking tanning mousse gives you a sun-kissed glow with no fake tan smell
Safe and gentle for all skin types—dermatologist-tested, non-comedogenic and suitable as both a face tanner and body tanner. Won’t clog pores or irritate sensitive skin
Tanologist sunless tanning products are always 100% cruelty-free and vegan—never tested on animals. Enjoy your guilt-free glow with this clean tanning solution
product_description: The Tanologist Self Tan Mousse is a totally transparent, water-to-foam formula that provides an all-over tan with zero transfer. This lightweight, fast absorbing, self-tanning foam develops quickly for a flawless finish. Infused with skincare ingredients like pink grapefruit, goji berry and juniper, this self-tanner helps to soften and hydrate the skin for tan that lasts. No color guide means no blocked pores, dryness or transfer to clothes and sheets. Apply the self-tanner mousse to your whole body in sweeping motions using a tanning mitt. Your tan will develop in 1-3 hours. For the deepest bronze, max it out overnight before showering. Your deep, natural-looking tan will last up to 7 days and fade evenly. Dermatologist tested and non-comedogenic, this self-tanning mousse is suitable for all skin types and tones. At Tanologist we believe in the universal power of glow, so we created clear, game changing, dermatologist approved self-tan innovations that are affordable and allow consumers to create their glow, in their shade, their way. Available in four customizable shades and a range of formats powered by skin-loving, derm approved formulas, Tanologist is guaranteed to work for all skin types and tones.

name: ColourPop Sol Liquid Sun Glow Drops - Buildable Face & Body Bronzer Drops - Glowy Summer Makeup Enriched with Niacinamide & Peptides for Radiant, Healthy-Looking Skin (1.11 oz)
short_description: Immediate Sun-Kissed Glow - Achieve a radiant, bronzed look with these lightweight, blendable glow drops designed for both face and body. Customize your glow for a natural or more sculpted, luminous finish.

Skincare-Infused Formula - Enriched with Niacinamide and Peptides, this liquid bronzer serum nourishes and hydrates skin while enhancing your complexion with microfine pearls for a smooth, non-glittery radiance.

Long-Lasting, Lightweight Wear - This water-light formula melts into the skin for a seamless, streak-free finish that stays put all day. Our bronzing drops are perfect for beauty routines, special events, and everyday radiance.

Application Tips - Mix 1-3 drops into your moisturizer for a no makeup makeup look or foundation for a bronzy glow. You can also add to body lotion to achieve glowing skin or apply directly to the skin for a customizable glow. The more drops, the more warmth and dimension!
Obsession-Worthy Beauty - We believe beauty should be fun, fearless, and accessible. That’s why we serve up trend-setting, cruelty-free formulas made for real life.

name: Self Tanning Drops for Face - USA Made with Organic & Natural Ingredients, Bronzing Face Tanning Drops with Aloe Vera, Non Toxic Self Tanner for Sunless Fake Tan & Natural Glow, Cruelty & Toxin Free
short_description: CLEAN BEAUTY, MADE IN THE USA: Made in the USA with 𝐧𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐚𝐥 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐨𝐫𝐠𝐚𝐧𝐢𝐜 𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐫𝐞𝐝𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 our self tanner drops offer a clean, skin-loving approach to self-tanning for both women and men.
FLAWLESS, NATURAL-LOOKING COLOR: Our tan drops with beet-derived DHA create a luminous golden hue — 𝐧𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐨𝐫𝐚𝐧𝐠𝐞, 𝐧𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐫 𝐬𝐭𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐤𝐲 — for a smooth, even finish that enhances your complexion.
NO SELF-TANNER ODOR: Experience a refreshing application without the unpleasant scent of traditional self-tanners — our sunless face tanner drops are perfect for 𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐲𝐝𝐚𝐲 𝐜𝐨𝐧𝐟𝐢𝐝𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐞.

SKINCARE-INFUSED FORMULA: Enriched with aloe vera, avocado oil, jojoba oil, glycerin, and green tea to hydrate, soothe, and nourish, our self tanner for face and body leaves skin soft, 𝐠𝐥𝐨𝐰𝐢𝐧𝐠, and healthy-looking.
CUSTOM LUXURY GLOW: Blend a few tanning face drops with your daily moisturizer for a naturally radiant, sun-kissed tone — a 𝐟𝐥𝐚𝐰𝐥𝐞𝐬𝐬, 𝐛𝐮𝐢𝐥𝐝𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐭𝐚𝐧 tailored to your skin.

name: Kiss My Face Sunless Self-Tanning Drops - Nourishing Coconut Oil And Chia Seed Oil - Infused With Antioxidant Liposomal Vitamin C And Red Algae - Vegan & Cruelty-Free - 1 fl oz Unit Carton
short_description: SUNLESS SELF-TANNING: Give your skin a glowing summer tan all year long. This formula is designed to be mixed with your favorite moisturizer for a custom glow. Enjoy a sun-kissed glow in just 4 hours.

VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE: Kiss My Face Sunless Self-Tanning Drops is Vegan, Cruelty-Free, with no Parabens, Phthalates, Sodium Lauryl/Laureth Sulfates, Mineral Oil, Artificial Colors, or Formaldehyde Donors.
ANTIOXIDANT-RICH: This unique blend is infused with antioxidant Liposomal Vitamin C, Red Algae, nourishing Coconut Oil, and Chia Seed Oil. Hydrate your skin for a sun-kissed radiance.

SUGGESTED USE: Shake prior to each use. Mix a few drops into your favorite moisturizer and apply evenly to clean, dry skin. Wash hands with soap and water immediately after use. Reapply to deepen or maintain color. For best results, wait at least 4 hours between applications.

KISS MY FACE: We pride ourselves on making high-quality, wholesome personal care products for the entire family. It’s our mission to find and combine wholesome ingredients to create the most effective and better body and personal care products anywhere.

name: Tanologist Light Self Tan Drops, Streak-Free Body & Face Tanning Drops, No Fake Tan Smell, For Moisturizer & Lotion, Bronzing Face Tanner, Skincare Ingredients, Vegan, 1.01 fl. oz/30 ml Bottle
short_description: Tanologist Self-Tan Drops are perfect for both face and body tanning, offering a customizable, streak-free tan without the fake tan smell. Achieve your ideal shade with no mess
Beginner-friendly, self-tanner drops provide a natural-looking tan in just 4 hours. Mix 3-4 drops with your favorite moisturizer or lotion for a bronzy glow. More drops = deeper tan
Self-tan drops are filled with skincare ingredients like pink grapefruit, goji berry and juniper to help hydrate and even out skin tone for a healthier complexion
Long-lasting self-tanner is available in 3 shades: Light, Medium, Dark and Extra Dark. Bronzing drops give you a sun-kissed, natural glow that isn’t orange or streaky
Safe and gentle for all skin types- dermatologist-tested, non-comedogenic and safe for sensitive skin. Enjoy a flawless tan without clogged pores or irritation
Tanologist sunless tanning products are always 100% cruelty-free and vegan—never tested on animals. Enjoy your guilt-free glow with this clean tanning solution
product_description: The Tanologist Self Tan Drops were created for both the face and body to provide a streak-free, natural looking tan. Our customizable formula is perfect for both new and experienced tanners, allowing you to control the level of tan you desire with every drop. These concentrated face tanning drops need to be added to your moisturizer for easy application. Infused with skincare ingredients like pink grapefruit, goji berry and juniper, these self-tanner drops help to soften and hydrate the skin. Our face and body tanning drops put you in control with the amount of drops you add – the more drops you use, the deeper the tan. Start by adding 3-4 drops to your favorite moisturizer. Increase usage until desired tan is achieved. Dermatologist tested and non-comedogenic, these self-tanning drops are suitable for all skin types and tones. At Tanologist we believe in the universal power of glow, so we created clear, game changing, dermatologist approved self-tan innovations that are affordable and allow consumers to create their glow, in their shade, their way. Available in four customizable shades and a range of formats powered by skin-loving, derm approved formulas, Tanologist is guaranteed to work for all skin types and tones.
